sense.name: procedure
sense.commentary: PROCESS[+event] a particular course of action intended to achieve a result
sense.examples: The procedure of obtaining a driver's license. It was a process of trial and error. The process of calcification begins later for boys than for girls. John find the process of thinking too tiresome. The process of denial...

sense.name: summons
sense.commentary: a writ issued by authority of law
sense.examples: A process usually compels the defendant's attendance in a civil suit; failure to appear results in a default judgement against the defendant

sense.name: outgrowth
sense.commentary: appendage - a natural prolongation or projection from a part of an organism either animal or plant
